# Tanh
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel TANH(number): Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the given number (angle in radians).

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `TANH`





## Advanced Parameter

`None`
